com.github.brokenswing.comixaire.facades.auth

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brokenswing.comixaire.facades.auth.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store the current state of the authentication system of the application. It stores either a logged in staff member, a logged in client or nothing in the case no user is logged in the system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Session() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Client getLoggedInClient() 
      StaffMember getLoggedInStaff() 
      void logout()
      Logs out any connected user, independently of it being a staff member or a client.
      If no user is logged in the system, this method does nothing.
      void setLoggedInClient(Client loggedInClient) 
      void setLoggedInStaff(StaffMember loggedInStaff)

    • Method Detail

      • getLoggedInClient

        public Client getLoggedInClient()
        Returns:
        the currently logged in client or null if no client is logged in the system

      • setLoggedInClient

        public void setLoggedInClient(Client loggedInClient)

      • getLoggedInStaff

        public StaffMember getLoggedInStaff()
        Returns:
        the currently logged in staff member or null if no staff member is logged in the system

      • setLoggedInStaff

        public void setLoggedInStaff(StaffMember loggedInStaff)

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Logs out any connected user, independently of it being a staff member or a client.
        If no user is logged in the system, this method does nothing.
